editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

ios.subtitle: Race and drive uphill to win!

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclip’s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

ios.subtitle: FIFA Mobile is now FC Mobile!

editorialNotes.short: A huge range of cars and tons of tracks. Get stuck in!

ios.subtitle: Grow to Eat! Snake Battle Game

editorialNotes.tagline: No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovio’s blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheen—and with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether it’s your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, you’ll be flying high in no time.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

name: Traffic Rider
artistName: Skgames Yazilim Muhendislik Teknoloji Ltd. Sti.

editorialNotes.short: Are you ready to rule the roads with your motorbike?

ios.subtitle: Fun with the talking pet cat!
Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile – we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.
This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property and rake in profits.
